reviews.review: 诚意很足，童年补票( •̀ ω •́ )y

The quintessential shooter from the early-to-mid 2000s, Half Life 2 somehow built upon what its predecessor had already managed to do perfectly: seamless storytelling and satisfying shooting, and what this game offers over the original is richer character development, introducing iconic figures in the Half Life universe and builds upon them well.
I've played through this game multiple times and the feeling of achievement I get every time I beat it is always the same. I highly recommend this game to anybody just getting introduced to Steam.

O jogo em si tem uma historia boa e simples de se entender, jogabilidade boa e gráficos que não são ruins levando em conta que é um jogo de 2004 o que faz ele rodar ate em uma torradeira se duvidar.

10/10 compraria de novo
Still fun after all these years. I recommend playing the original Half-Life first because there is a bit of a back story.

Half Life 2 é um clássico, mas que envelheceu extremamente bem. O Rei dos FPS merece e deve ser jogado por todos os amantes do gênero, qualquer coisa mais do que isso, não merece ser lida. Vá jogar e viver essa experiência maravilhosa que esse jogo proporciona.
a unica coisa que falta é o proximo jogo, mas o chefe não sabe contar até tres XD

Half-Life 2 é um divisor de águas dos jogos de computador e também no mundo dos games. Apresenta uma história com enigmas e mistérios bastante envolvente, além de uma jogabilidade bastante sólida, cenários muito bonitos e situações bem diversas para se resolver. Tem diferenças significativas em relação ao primeiro, sendo este mais voltado prioritariamente ao combate dos Xen ("alienígenas") e "estacar a sangria" causada pelo incidente de Black Mesa, enquanto Half-Life 2 foca-se em um combate contra outros humanos, em uma distopia muito bem construída.

Não é a toa que é um dos jogos mais bem avaliados da história. Vale a experiência. Entretanto, recomendo fortemente, para se ter uma experiência mais completa, que se jogue o primeiro antes (que consta com um remake muito bem produzido, por fãs, chamado Black Mesa).

On retrouve ce qu'on avait aimé dans Half-Life 1, avec une touche de gore supplémentaire. Par contre, le "big boss final" est bien plus facile à avoir que celui du premier, et le jeu est beaucoup plus court aussi. Un peu déçue sur la longueur et la facilité de la fin du coup.

콤바인에게 모든 걸 빼앗겼다. 재산, 가족 그리고 자유마저도... 하지만, 혜성처럼 등장한 자유인 덕분에 우린 모두 해방을 위해 싸운다.

" 박사님, 당신을 따르겠어요! "

용기 내어 그에게 외치자, 그는 끄덕임도 없이 보급상자를 부숴 수류탄을 집어 들었다. 영웅은 과묵하다 이건가... 콤바인 저격수의 총탄을 피해 재빠르게 달려나가는 그를 따라잡으려 했지만, 난 그저 평범한 인간이기에 총에 맞고 말았다. 영웅은 나 같은건 거들떠도 안본채 갈 길을 가고, 내 몸의 힘은 피와 함께 빠져나간다.

' 세상에 영웅 같은 건, 없는 건가... '

씁쓸함과 비참함을 곱씹으며 눈을 감으려던 그때, 그가 돌아온다. 눈에 띄는 주황색 보호복을 입은 그가 내게로 달려오고 있다. 아, 내가 오해한 건가... 날 치료하기 위해, 메디킷을 찾기 위해 서두르셨던 건가... 눈물이 뺨을 타고 흐를 때

' ...... '

그는 내가 떨어뜨린 AR-2 탄약만 홀랑 뺀 채 다시 제 갈 길을 향해 달려간다. 난 마지막 희망을 버리고 눈을 감았다.
plain objective, fast moving, lots of fun.

I know why they don't go to Ravenholm now

There's a reason I have all the achievements in this game (other than I have no life) and it's that this game is just soo fucking good. It's better than the original Half-Life in almost every way. This game does not deserve to be as cheap as it is, the puzzles are amazing, the combat is pretty ok, and everything else is fucking beautiful. Thank you Valve.

Very enjoyable game. I don't understand the complaints some videos share online. The nods to Gordon not talking don't happen as much as you'd expect, and are very subtle, it does take you out a bit but it's only like once or twice. The boat level is strangely long but still introduces entertaining level ideas and puzzles. The characters are my favorite part of HL2 and it's episodes. Alyx is a badass, Eli is kind and feels like a grandpa. Everyone has their own characteristics. The story is interesting. The game made me feel very lonely, and it felt realistic in that sense, since a lot of the time you're really on your own, and meeting with the scarce collections of people is really fun. You feel much like a lone ranger. My favorite aspects in order: Characters, Atmosphere, Physics Puzzles, Story
jogasso, jogabilidade excelente, graficos ótimos pra 2004, ambientação fenomenal, mereceu ir pro goty, F eli
it is too good plz make comic
It's a beaut but I play way too much

I don't think there's anything good about Half-Life 2 I can say that hasn't already been said. This game is such a solid and enjoyable experience from start to finish. There was never a moment where I felt like a mission was wasting my time, which says a lot, considering the huge variety of different objectives and mission structures. It was super interesting to take a look "back in time" and realize how many modern games are built upon foundational ideas that HL2 established in 2004. If you're at all interested in the history of PC shooters, Half-Life 2 is a must-play title.
One of the best games of all time, perfect setting, perfect gameplay and perfect story 10/10 all around!!!

Just built my first PC, and this game has always been on my "to play" list.  Half-Life 2 still holds up to today's gaming standards and goes above and beyond most modern first person shooters. The progression feels great. The story is phenomenal, and the combat is responsive and very satisfying.

On top of all that, that platforming in the game is fun, and not a chore. I applaud Valve on making puzzles in this game enjoyable and rewarding. There are so many ways to go about getting to the end of a level or completing a task that I will definitely be coming back.

Zacznę recenzje od tego zdania: Któż nie zna Gordona Freemana i jego łomu :D (zdanie ze starej recenzji Quaza)
Half-Life 2, jedna z najwyżej ocenianych strzelanek na metacritic, gra kultowa i gra mojego dzieciństwa (i wielu innych osób). Pamiętam jak pierwszy raz zagrałem w HL2 jeszcze w wersji non-steam i wciągnąłem sie na wiele godzin. Ostatnio odświeżyłem sobie tą gre i byłem pod wielkim wrażeniem jak ta gra jest świetna nawet po prawie 16 latach. Genialnie skonstruowana rozgrywka, która nie nudziła mnie ani przez chwile wraz z wykorzystaniem innowacyjnego i niedoścignionego silnika fizycznego. Jeśli nie słuchamy ciekawych dialogów poprzedzających fabułe, to prawdopodobnie walczymy z ciekawymi przeciwnikami lub rozwiązujemy jakąś zagadke logiczną, jeździmy pojazdem lub dowodzimy oddziałem. Każda acryciekawa akcja przechodzi płynnie w drugą. Jeszcze pare słów o fabule, które jest dobrze napisana, na początek trafimy do City 17 wzorowanego na miastach bloku wschodniego, opanowanego przez kombinat i tak zaczyna sie nasza przygoda. Nie chcę spoilerować wam jej ale moge powiedzieć że jest bardzo ciekawa, trafiamy na ciekawe postacie jak np. urocza Alyx Vance, Eli, Doctor Kleiner czy Dog, czyli metalowy pies :3. Troche szkoda że zakończenie nie daje tyle satysfakcji jakbyśmy tego chcieli (ale na szczęście są jeszcze dwa epizody, które może dla was zrecenzuje). Grafika jest ładna, chociaż nie aż taka jak np. w pierwszym Far Cry, ale styl graficzny drugiego Half-Life'a cały czas bardzo dobrze sie trzyma. Strzelanie oraz bronie są bardzo fajnie, wymienie przykłady tych najlepszych: ikoniczny łom, mocny revolver, SMG, który może strzelać małymi granatami, AR2, strzelba, kusza pełniąca role snajperki oraz OCZYWIŚCIE Gravity Gun, dzięki któremu można podnosić obiekty, rzucać nimi, rozwiązywać zagadki, ale również może służyć jako ciekawy oręż :) . Lokacje nie są jakieś ogromne, ale są całkiem ładnie zrobione jak np. City 17, Droga przez kanały, Black Mesa East, Ravenholm, Autostrada 17, Nova Prospect czy Cytadela Dr. Breena. Nadal miłe wrażenie robią też animacje postacii. Pełne ikoniczne są te dobre postacie, jak i nasi przeciwnicy jak np. Funkcjonariusze City 17,  Kombinaci, Stridery, Headcraby, Zombiaki czy Antiliony. Fajne są batalie z helikopterem Kombintu, Striderami, Strażnikami Antilionów czy Gunshipami. Gra nie jest jakoś specjalnie trudna, ukończenie jej, w zależności od umiejętności gracza, czyli tak z 8-13 godzin (lub krócej). Na plus zaliczyć jeszcze można Soundtrack, niezłe AI, przyjemne w zdobywaniu osiągnięcia (oprócz jednego) oraz niska cena. 36 zł za świetną strzelanke ? Warto kupić (na przecenie około 7,19 zł). Według mnie najlepszy FPS na pecety. Jedynie co sie mi nie podobało to zakończenie oraz strzelanie nie jest tak dobrze zrobione jak współcześnie, ale nadal jest dobrze. POLECAM KAŻDEMU Z CAŁYM SERCEM ! 10/10 GRA. <3 :>
